titleStmt.title: Moyses in a map of his miracles. By Michael Drayton Esquire
titleStmt.author: Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Humfrey Lownes, and are to be sold by Thomas Man the younger,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "[par.]"; the last leaf is blank.
Running title reads: The map of miracle.
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books, Tract Supplement reel E4 has title page only.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
